original_text: When the apostles arrived back in Jerusalem, they went to their room. The room where they were staying was upstairs. Those apostles were Peter, John, James and Andrew; Philip and Thomas; Bartholomew and Matthew; also James the son of Alphaeus, Simon the Zealot, and Judas, the son of James.
korean_text: 들어가 그들이 유하는 다락방으로 올라가니 베드로, 요한, 야고보, 안드레와 빌립, 도마와 바돌로매, 마태와 및 알패오의 아들 야고보, 셀롯인 시몬, 야고보의 아들 유다가 다 거기 있어

sentences.original_text: When the apostles arrived back in Jerusalem
The room where they were staying was upstairs
Those apostles were Peter, John, James and Andrew
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사도들은 베드로, 요한, 야고보, 안드레였습니다

sentences.original_text: also James the son of Alphaeus
and Judas, the son of James
